main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing an unidentified flying object over Lansing, Michigan on December 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and elongated, about 40 ft long, 15 ft wide, with a bright light emanating from the rear., Witnesses observed the object hovering for a period of time before it accelerated rapidly and disappeared., The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes., Weather conditions were overcast, which impacted visibility., Photographs were taken at the site but the quality was poor due to atmospheric conditions.
